s.text: The pundits happily recycled their hoariest 1997 sound bites in a road-rage rampage of drive-by analysis.

Poinsettias took Issue 1 honors as Fox News Sunday , NBC's Meet the Press , CBS's Face the Nation , CNN's Late Edition , ABC's This Week , and The McLaughlin Group displayed festive Euphorbia pulcherrima on their sets.

Michael Beschloss ( Face the Nation ) linked Washington's lost vitality to the end of the imperial presidency, while other Face the Nation yakkers (Bob Schieffer, Stephen Carter, and Ellen Goodman) pinned it on politicians and the presidents who have failed to frame our pressing problems (race, Social Security insolvency, women's issues) in political terms.
Now, said Mark Shields ( Face the Nation ), we have a president who endorses contradictory initiatives like teen curfew and midnight basketball.

Poinsettias took Issue 1 honors as Fox News Sunday , NBC's Meet the Press , CBS's Face the Nation , CNN's Late Edition , ABC's This Week , and The McLaughlin Group displayed festive Euphorbia pulcherrima on their sets.

Poinsettias took Issue 1 honors as Fox News Sunday , NBC's Meet the Press , CBS's Face the Nation , CNN's Late Edition , ABC's This Week , and The McLaughlin Group displayed festive Euphorbia pulcherrima on their sets.
Mark Shields triple dribbled his astonishment that a new opinion poll will crown Clinton the most popular president ever ( NewsHour , Capital Gang , Face the Nation ).

The more formulaic shows (CNN's Capital Gang , The McLaughlin Group , Fox News Sunday ) offered predictions for 1998 and "awards" (Worst Politician, Biggest Loser, Brightest New Face) to disguise their lack of enterprise, while the more somber programs dodged hard work with toasts to their last 50 years ( Meet the Press ), their last 30 years ( Washington Week in Review ), and their last year ( Face the Nation ).

Michael Beschloss ( Face the Nation ) linked Washington's lost vitality to the end of the imperial presidency, while other Face the Nation yakkers (Bob Schieffer, Stephen Carter, and Ellen Goodman) pinned it on politicians and the presidents who have failed to frame our pressing problems (race, Social Security insolvency, women's issues) in political terms.

Poinsettias took Issue 1 honors as Fox News Sunday , NBC's Meet the Press , CBS's Face the Nation , CNN's Late Edition , ABC's This Week , and The McLaughlin Group displayed festive Euphorbia pulcherrima on their sets.

The more formulaic shows (CNN's Capital Gang , The McLaughlin Group , Fox News Sunday ) offered predictions for 1998 and "awards" (Worst Politician, Biggest Loser, Brightest New Face) to disguise their lack of enterprise, while the more somber programs dodged hard work with toasts to their last 50 years ( Meet the Press ), their last 30 years ( Washington Week in Review ), and their last year ( Face the Nation ).
